name: 林家弘
objective: Owing to the relatively small fiber core, many third order nonlinearity effect including self-phase modulation, four wave mixing, stimulated Raman scattering will be excited as high intensity pulsed light propagation in fiber.  In addition, the nonlinearity will be enhanced by means of novel fiber such as photonics crystal fiber or tapered fiber.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of optical fiber and propagation theory (Nonlinear Schrödinger equation) to simulate different kind of nonlinear optical phenomenon.  In addition, it will introduce the principle of the mode-locked fiber laser and variety soliton dynamics.
schedule:
第一週 光纖簡介 I (歷史回顧與光纖製作)
       Introduction (Historical Perspective and fiber fabrication)
第二週 光纖簡介 II (光纖特徵)
       Introduction (Fiber characteristics)
第三週 光纖極化與應用 
      Polarization of fiber and its application
第四週 光纖非線性光學簡介 
      Introduction of nonlinear optics in fiber
第五週 光纖光學原理 I 
       Principle of fiber optics I
第六週 光纖光學原理 II 
       Principle of fiber optics II
第七週 脈衝傳播方程式 I (脈衝傳播方程式)
       Pulse propagation in fibers I (Pulse propagation equation)
第八週 脈衝傳播方程式 II (分階傅立葉法)
        Pulse propagation in fibers I (Split step Fourier method)
第九週  期中考
       Midterm examination
第十週 群速度色散 I (色散造成脈衝的變寬)
       Group velocity dispersion (Dispersion induced pulse broadening)
第十一週 自相位調變 I (自相位調變造成光頻譜變化)
        SPM induced spectral changes
第十二週 理論模擬非線性光學效應
        Simulation of nonlinear optical effect
第十三週 光纖雷射簡介 I (連續波光纖雷射)
        Introduction of Fiber laser I (CW fiber laser)
第十四週 光纖雷射 II (傳統光孤子光纖雷射)
        Introduction of Fiber laser II (conventional soliton fiber laser)
第十五週 光孤子動態 I (耗散光孤子雷射)
        Introduction of Fiber laser II (dissipative soliton fiber laser)
第十六週 光孤子動態 I 
        Soliton dynamics I
第十七週 光孤子動態 II
       Soliton dynamics II
第十八週 期末考 (Final examination)
scorePolicy:
期中考 (Midterm examination) 40%
